item.description:
Once again, attendee's sway the vote! Polls be d**ned!

We'll be embarking on Undaunted Courage by Stephen Ambrose. Many thanks to Andrea for this splendid suggestion by one of my favorite authors (Band of Brothers and D-Day are amongst my most cherished reads). This one embarks to tell the story of Lewis and Clark, filling in all the gaps that all of us non-history majors totally missed out on.

For potentially too much info :-), check out the link below:

http://www.craigr.com...

The Harvest Co-op has a great discussion setting, centrally localized and easy to get to by T or car or foot. However, if folks want to use the group as a means to explore new eateries, I'm open for suggestions. Till then, we'll stick to the couches and the coffee.

Contact Asst. Organizer Lisa with any questions!
item.name: Cambridge Meet-up: Undaunted Courage
